translation: Supercar Blondie is an influancer who gets exclusive first look and access to new and conceptual cars. With her passion for high speeds and luxury vehicles, the lady has become a favorite of automotive enthusiasts from all over the world. Saudi Arabia . Thanks so much for having me!Moves to Dubai and starts to create car content while working as a radio guide. From Yugoslavia to South Africa - which is the favorite car of generations worldwide (VIDEO) Thanks to its more than 115 million followers on YouTube, Instagram and TikTok, Hershe has become one of the biggest creators of automotive content on the Internet. She has successfully built her own company, which includes a digital platform for young talent, a studio for automotive design and channels in various social media platforms.Luis Hamilton himself tells Hershe: You know a lot more about cars than I do. Hearing or truth: Western companies give up on electric cars Supercar Blondie expresses his pride that he manages to pave the way of enthusiasts like her, opening a new door to the world of cars and inspires them to pursue their passions in an industry dominated by men.Read more in the video. It is part of the broadcast  "Specify" by the Deutsche Welle, which is broadcast every Monday at 14:30 on NOVA NEWS.
